remarks: The norm of the image by ` QQHom ` of a rational number in a topological division ring.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Nov-2017.)
statement:
qqhnm.n $e |- N = ( norm ` R ) $.
qqhnm.z $e |- Z = ( ZMod ` R ) $.
qqhnm $p |- ( ( ( R e. ( NrmRing i^i DivRing ) /\ Z e. NrmMod /\ ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) /\ Q e. QQ ) -> ( N ` ( ( QQHom ` R ) ` Q ) ) = ( abs ` Q ) ) $.
